features.name: Sensitive to Light
features.description: When you take radiant damage, you're also blinded until the start of your next turn.

features.name: Concussive Attack
features.description: When you critically hit a target with an attack, it must make a Constitution saving throw DC 12 or be Stunned until the end of its next turn.

features.name: Club
features.description: Melee: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 bludgeoning damage.
